ai_analysis.analysis: The extreme temperature reading hints at a potential thermal vent or heat source in the environment. This could be an exciting discovery, as it may indicate geological activity or even signs of life.
ai_analysis.exploration_question: Is this temperature anomaly causing any unusual seismic activity?
ai_analysis.user_instructions: Attach a sound sensor to the board and conduct an experiment by generating different sounds nearby, observing potential correlations with the thermal vent
